body_html: In this case, I am not using eager execution at all. I am using graph execution using the tf.Variable and tfe.Variable. My understanding is that if I use tfe.Variable (instead of tf.Variable), then I should be able to switch out graph and eager modes easily. In order for this work, the results should be consistent between tf.Variable and tfe.Variable. As the above example shows, they are not. If this is expected behavior, it is not clear from the documentation.
